Job Description: Job Description      The ideal candidate will be working alongside fellow software engineering professionals, as they continue to develop and improve the software that powers the Cloud. This area of Engineering is responsible for the technical design, service implementation and support of one of the world\u2019s largest and most interconnected set of data centers. If you are a talented professional who is passionate about technology, seeks responsibility, thrives when empowered and understands the importance of personal accountability, they want to talk to you!   The successful candidate will work as a Software Development Manager as part of the company Cloud Network team with a focus on the following key responsibilities:    Provide functional direction to a team of approximately 15 software engineers.   Work closely with them to ensure they have what they need, remove impediments and enable them to meet commitments.   Provide technical leadership and guidance.   Work across functional teams to drive quality deliverables.   Build, grow, lead, and mentor the team.   Work within a Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery development model.   Engage with the team in a daily collaborative style.   Foster a culture of continuous improvement.
